column5: A group of buddies and their sons are heading accross the border this summer and a couple of the sons have MIP (minor in possession) tickets. I know of the DWI problems when crossing the border, how about an MIP??? thanks
Could be wrong, but. It is my understanding that juvenile records are not accessible. Unless you were tried as an adult.
If in possession you are talking beer, it's not a felony here, so no sweat.
